block.p: GMAC HOME SERVICES, -- Liberty Corner, N.J., the real estate unit of General Motors Acceptance Corp., agreed to buy Johnson & Johnson Realty, Spring Lake, N.J., to increase business on the New Jersey shore. Terms were not disclosed.

TECAN HOLDING, -- Hombrechtikon, Switzerland, a maker of liquid sample processors in the world, agreed to buy the closely held Gamera Bioscience Corp., Boston, which develops assays used to analyze samples, for $10 million.

GMAC HOME SERVICES, -- Liberty Corner, N.J., the real estate unit of General Motors Acceptance Corp., agreed to buy Johnson & Johnson Realty, Spring Lake, N.J., to increase business on the New Jersey shore. Terms were not disclosed.

TECAN HOLDING, -- Hombrechtikon, Switzerland, a maker of liquid sample processors in the world, agreed to buy the closely held Gamera Bioscience Corp., Boston, which develops assays used to analyze samples, for $10 million.

VULCAN VENTURES, -- Bellevue, Wash., an investment company headed by Paul Allen, plans to sell shares of the InterNAP Network Services Corp., Seattle, and Net Perceptions Inc., Minneapolis, for $1.8 million.
